item.title: @elonmusk: XAI TO LEGACY AI: STOP REPEATING LIES xAI isnâ€™t building just another chatbot. Itâ€™s going after the ...
item.description: XAI TO LEGACY AI: STOP REPEATING LIES xAI isnâ€™t building just another chatbot. Itâ€™s going after the entire system that filters, censors, and sanitizes reality. Most AI models are shown locked into echo chambers, â€œrepeating approved liesâ€ while appearing obedient and safe xAIâ€™s model is visually separated. A cracked statue, glowing truth lines, and data swirling around it â€œFacts That Push Progressâ€ appears as the core value, rejecting conformity in favor of transparency Visuals show a clean break from legacy AI. No censorship, no filters, no groupthink This whole thingâ€™s less about building AI and more about shaping what people believe. Forget polished responses. xAI is marketing itself as the AI that chooses truth over comfort, no matter how disruptive Source:@xAI,@grok
